revised_title: Optical Rotatory Dispersion Formula for Quartz
tldr: The authors present a new formula for the optical rotatory dispersion of quartz, which takes into account the wave-lengths of the Lowry rotatory dispersion. The formula provides a more accurate representation of the observed and calculated values of optical rotation, and it offers a better theoretical basis compared to previous formulas. The formula also explains the constant effect of the infra-red band and retains its influence in the new formula.
